item.title: Making hakasebot - Twitter Bots 101
item.description: ![Bots]({{ site.url }}/images/twitter-bots.gif “Bots”) This was my first attempt making twitter bots. I made a very simple twitter bot for this blog, check the Source and also follow @_hakasebot. Setting Up The bot was created using the Twit package, which is a Twitter API client for Node.js.
